name: One Night with CLARA
description:
Story:

You are going to meet a girl you've found from dating application. Her name is CLARA.

You will ask her to go on dates in places like restaurant, beach, or even having dinner in her house.

You have to be nice to her then you will get what you expect.



Gameplay:

This game is a simple visual novel game. It's full 3D real-time rendering and has full animated climax scenes.
The story is short, simple, and easy to get in. Many achievements are waiting for you to collect.
